name: twilight zone season 2 does anyone else have prob with bad lines
reviewBody: i recently bought season 2 of the twilight zone and was surprised at the quality of some of the episodes, there were 5 episodes in total that had lots of line going thru the screen like interference, the sound also seems different i know that this show is old and you could say its with age, but season 1 was perfect, and most of the season 2 is as well, can anyone else let me know if they have noticed this, and even try to explain this, at this moment not to sure if i want to buy the 3RD season if there ARE going to be any more like this, the box sets are expensive enough, will be contacting the people who distribute these discs
